name: places/ChIJiUApbp1YwokR7FtbsDEtNzc
formattedAddress: 700 North Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 700 North Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: Loved this dentist, efficient work yet very attentive. She hooked my teeth up, several other times I got cleanings from other dentistry’s I was never offered nor suggested to receive a deep clean, the mindful dentist however realized I needed one and immediately did the work changing the appearance of my gums and brought confidence back to me within my smile. I am so grateful.

originalText.text:
I went to this place about a week ago. I asked for a x ray and a filling for my broken tooth. The staff (lady at front desk and teeth cleaner/x-ray staff) are phenomenal. So nice and amazing. But the main dentist. Dr. Shah is HORRIBLE! I’m trying to get one procedure done and she’s trying to get me to pay for 2 more procedures on the same day… She told me my insurance didn’t cover tooth fillings but, after calling elsewhere, my insurance should have covered it since it was one of my two front teeth. She is clearly lying and adding her name to trusted sources to call for insurance but then when you get there she will tell you insurance doesn’t cover it and that you have to fork out $250 or  she will refuse to do it and send you on your way.  If I wasn’t extremely desperate that day I would have refused but I just paid her and she did the procedure. The tooth feels so THIN! She told me not to bite down on anything hard but to be honest, with as thin as she made the tooth filling, I cannot bite down on anything at all. Not even a marshmallow. I’m planning to get this one replaced once I find a more trustworthy dentist. I’ve definitely learned a good lesson from this horrible dentist.. Always check the reviews. If 100 people are claiming someone is a liar, does horrible work and over charges please believe the reviews, we have no reason to lie. She really cons people and over charges them and her work isn’t even good. I’m sure the second I bite down on this tooth it’s all over and I definitely wasted $250 going to her location. Please heed my warning so you don’t get taken advantage of like I was. What a horrible dentist experience. I wish there was an option to give 0 stars…

Edit also forgot to mention she numbed me for this procedure (a cap tooth) which doesn’t need it at all and was also trying to pull at my crown which is located right next to it and it felt as if she was trying to purposely make it loose or pull the cap down and completely off. I’m pretty sure that’s why she numbed my gums because she was hoping I couldn’t feel it.. but I did.

originalText.text: DO NOT GO HERE! Her front desk services are disorganized and unprofessional. I went in for a cleaning and she found cavities on both sides of my mouth. She said she could do one side today and the other side next week. Then the doctor tried to sell me things I didn’t need. But when I told her no she all of a sudden changed up and refused to treat me next week. She was curt and rude. When it came to actually filling my cavity, without warning tried to shove a syringe the size of my forearm into my mouth! And she had to do it twice because she didn’t put enough anesthetic. I still felt pain but I didn’t want to be there a second longer. My dad went here, the front desk was having a personal conversation and made him wait half an hour until she was done to check him in, then the doctor herself was on the phone with India for 1.5 hours and delayed his appointment. The only person I would trust there is the guy that came in to clean my teeth. Don’t come here, you will regret it.

originalText.text: I had a good visit. I went for X-ray and cleaning. Both were done in a professional manner. Will go back. Thank you

text.text: I had a good visit. I went for X-ray and cleaning. Both were done in a professional manner. Will go back. Thank you

originalText.text: Great customer service with staff. The actual dentist is a very rude person. Dr.Meena Shah Very unprofessional. And very bad hygiene Manner While I had insurance she wanted to pressure me to give her money in advance to hold while she contacts my insurance provider for additional Work to be done I bet you you should go there with the best set of teeth and she will say there’s something wrong with them. I will never recommend this dentistry.
